cPJ4uLzbvY76RGlx.name: Augury
cPJ4uLzbvY76RGlx.description:
With the aid of a divining tool, you receive an omen from beyond the Material Plane about the results of a specific course of action that you intend to take within the next 30 minutes. The Narrator chooses from the following:

  • Fortunate omen (good results)
  • Calamity omen (bad results)
  • Ambivalence omen (both good and bad results)
  • No omen (results that aren't especially good or bad)

This omen does not account for possible circumstances that could change the outcome, such as making additional preparations.

When you cast this spell again before finishing a long rest, the chance of getting a random reading from the above options increases. The Narrator makes the following roll in secret: second casting—25%, third casting—50%, fourth casting—75%, fifth casting—100%.

OuWazcIcB0Pp8nlN.name: Divination
OuWazcIcB0Pp8nlN.description:
Your offering and magic put you in contact with the higher power you serve or its representatives.

You ask a single question about something that will (or could) happen in the next 7 days. The Narrator offers a truthful reply, which may be cryptic or even nonverbal as appropriate to the being in question.

The reply does not account for possible circumstances that could change the outcome, such as making additional precautions.

When you cast this spell again before finishing a long rest, the chance of getting a random reading from the above options increases. The Narrator makes the following roll in secret: second casting—25%, third casting—50%, fourth casting—75%, fifth casting—100%.

system.description: At 10th level you have gained an almost sixth sense for future trouble or near supernatural abilities of deductive prediction, driven by the need (some might say a paranoid need) to anticipate what others cannot.  You no longer lose access to @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.jet01i63abb2v66h]{Measure Twice, Cut Once} on a successful check.  Instead, each time you succeed the DC for future checks increases by 5, resetting to 15 when you level up or finish a long rest if you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.nkvadgg6nsrvscat]{True Genius}.  In addition, you may expend a hit die to replicate the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.qsa7b22n3y1pbzf6]{Augury} spell, or a hit die and inspiration to replicate the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.bs3wnsid88tbup6c]{Divination} spell.
